# MKAnnotationView.DragState.none

**Case**

An annotation view that doesn’t have a drag operation.

## Declaration

```swift
case none
```

## Discussion

The view isn’t involved in a drag operation. The annotation view is responsible for returning itself to this state when a drag ends or cancels.

## Constants

- **MKAnnotationView.DragState.starting**: An annotation view begins dragging.
- **MKAnnotationView.DragState.dragging**: An annotation view is actively dragging.
- **MKAnnotationView.DragState.canceling**: An annotation view cancels drag operation.
- **MKAnnotationView.DragState.ending**: An annotation view ends dragging.

items.description: An annotation view is actively dragging.

items.description: An annotation view cancels drag operation.
